name: Podrace Prep
Lore: 'Advanced preparation in Podracing is usually the key to winning. A little extra work at the start can mean a lot in the long run.',
Text: 'LOST: Instead of drawing race destiny, use a card from hand.STARTING: Deploy Podrace Arena (with a Podracer, opponent may also deploy a Podracer there), Boonta Eve Podrace and any Effect that deploys for free. Place Interrupt in Reserve Deck.',
